title: Flask of Cursed Flames
summaries: The Flask of Cursed Flames is a Hardmode flask that causes melee weapons and whips(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) to inflict the Cursed Inferno debuff for 3–6 seconds on enemies hit. Melee weapons that fire projectiles will also inflict the debuff on enemies hit by the projectiles (except for the Flairon's bubbles).

The Flask of Cursed Flames cannot be used in conjunction with other flasks, and using it will remove any existing flask effects. (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Like all other flasks, the effect will not be canceled when the player dies.
The Flask of Cursed Flames will not inflict the Cursed Flames debuff in <linked>PvP</linked> scenarios.<small class="plainlinks"></small>

statistics.Tooltip: Melee and Whip attacks inflict enemies with cursed flames
